dcterms:creator: G. Li
Y. Wei
T. Tian
dcterms:description: The MUSIC-AVQA dataset contains 45,867 question-answer pairs distributed across 9,288 videos, totaling over 150 hours of content. Each video features an average of 5 QA pairs, covering various scenarios including audio, visual, and audio-visual questions, making it suitable for studying spatio-temporal reasoning in dynamic and long-term audio-visual scenes.
dcterms:title: MUSIC-AVQA
